AÂ '''White WalkerÂ '''â€‹is an unnamed minor character in theÂ [[Season 4|fourth season]]. He is played by guest star [[Ross Mullan]] and only appears in "[[Oathkeeper]]".
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 4]]===
The White Walker travels to the [[Haunted Forest]] near [[Craster's Keep]] and seizes [[Craster's last son]], who had been left out in the snow by [[Rast]]. He takes the child deep into the [[Lands of Always Winter]], where he places him on an icy altar. His [[White Walkers' master|master]] then takes the baby and turns him into a [[White Walkers|White Walker]].<ref>"[[Oathkeeper]]"</ref>
